Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add user suspension and deletion for admin dashboard

- Add suspension fields to User schema (suspendedAt, suspendedUntil, suspensionReason, suspendedBy)
- Add new ActivityTypes: USER_SUSPENDED, USER_UNSUSPENDED, USER_DELETED_BY_ADMIN
- Block suspended users from logging in (credentials + OAuth)
- Auto-unsuspend when suspension period expires
- Add suspend/unsuspend API endpoints with email notifications
- Add admin delete endpoint with Stripe subscription cancellation
- Add suspension/termination email templates (EN/NL)
- Add UserActions component with suspend/delete modals
- Protect admin accounts from suspension/deletion
- Require group ownership transfer before user deletion

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement personal PINs per member instead of shared group PINs

Previously, PIN protection was set at the group level, meaning all members
shared the same PIN. This defeated the purpose when partners in the same
Secret Santa group wanted to protect their wishlists from each other on
shared devices.

Now each member can set their own personal PIN:
- Move pinHash/pinEnabledAt from Bubble to BubbleMember model
- Any member can set their own PIN (not just owners/admins)
- PIN verification checks the current user''s membership PIN
- Activity log now shows both user and bubble name for clarity
- Updated EN/NL translations to reflect "your personal PIN"

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add admin analytics dashboard

- Create /api/admin/analytics endpoint with comprehensive metrics
- Build visually appealing analytics page with:
  - Summary stats (events, sessions, users, avg events/session)
  - Events over time chart
  - Event category distribution pie chart
  - Device type breakdown with progress bars
  - Top pages with bar visualization
  - User journey funnel tracking
  - Real-time event stream
- Add Analytics link to admin navigation
- Support period filtering (24h, 7d, 30d, 90d)
- Add EN/NL translations

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

unified input. Now auto-detects whether user entered a URL (triggers
scraping) or search terms (triggers automatic product search with
debounce).

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Switch to Prisma Accelerate for connection pooling

- Use accelerateUrl in PrismaClient for edge connection pooling
- Update prisma.config.ts to use DIRECT_DATABASE_URL for migrations
- Add @prisma/extension-accelerate package
- Add /api/health endpoint for connection warming
- Simplify db client code by removing manual pg pool management

This should eliminate cold start connection errors after deployments.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add centralized email queue for rate-limited sending

- Add EmailQueue model with priority support \(HIGH/NORMAL\) and status tracking
- Implement queue library with 600ms delay between sends to respect Resend''s 2 req/sec limit
- Add cron job to process queue every 2 minutes \(up to 150 emails per run\)
- Update weekly-digest, event-reminder, wishlist-reminder, and scheduled-draw crons to use queue
- Add admin page to monitor and manage email queue with retry functionality
- Critical emails still send immediately; failed ones get queued with HIGH priority

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(to Client Component props" errors that weren''t being captured in Sentry.

EOF
\)")

The admin contact page uses dynamic translation lookup with database values

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
revert: Remove ineffective url.parse\(\) warning suppression from instrumentation

The DEP0169 warning originates from Next.js core server code which loads
before instrumentation runs. The fix requires setting NODE_OPTIONS
environment variable in Vercel with --disable-warning=DEP0169.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(admin\): remove broken quick action links

Remove "Add User" and "Send Notification" quick actions that linked to
non-existent routes \(/admin/users/new and /admin/notifications/new\),
causing 404 errors.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(build\): skip Prisma queries during production build phase

Next.js build phase has no database access on Vercel. Check for
NEXT_PHASE="phase-production-build" and return placeholder data.
Pages use ISR \(on-demand generation\) at runtime instead.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve TypeScript and ESLint errors across codebase

- Fix NextMiddleware null type errors in API tests by using `as never` cast
- Fix RateLimitResult property name from `reset` to `resetAt`
- Fix RequestInit type compatibility in api-test-utils.ts
- Fix ActivityType enum type error in admin activity page
- Extract Date.now\(\) calls to constants to fix impure function render errors
- Fix prefer-const lint errors in simulate route and bubble-chat
- Add eslint-disable comments for intentional setState in useEffect patterns
- Add missing TrendingUp import in analytics page
- Remove unused imports and variables

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
